00158         static void threadBase( Runner* _runner, NetCache* _cache, unsigned _cur_thread_no, boost::barrier* _barrier)
00159         {
00160             RunDirection dir = _runner->getDirection();
00161 
00162             unsigned layer;
00163             (dir == ForwardRun) ?  (layer = 0) : (layer = _cache->data.size() - 2);
00164 
00165             do {
00166                 //Process current layer
00167                 NetCache::ThreadTaskType* task = &_cache->data[layer][_cur_thread_no];
00168                 for(unsigned i = 0; i < task->size(); ++i)
00169                     _runner->run( (*task)[i] );
00170 
00171                 //Wait for other threads
00172                 _barrier->wait();
00173             } while( (dir == ForwardRun && ++layer < _cache->data.size() - 1) || (dir == BackwardRun && layer-- > 0) );
00174             /*
00175              * A little comment.
00176              * Cache structure:
00177              * Layer1:   thread1_data, thread2_data, ...
00178              * Layer2:   thread1_data, thread2_data, ...
00179              * ...
00180              * LayerN-1: thread1_data, thread2_data, ...
00181              * LayerN:          <= last layer. ALWAYS empty! (see Net::regenerateCache())
00182              * cache.size() == N+1;
00183              * thread_data is vector of NeuronIter
00184              */
00185         };
00186 
00187         /* Debug interface */
00188     public:
00189         void printDebugInfo(std::ostringstream& ost) const
00190         {
00191             
00192             ost<<"Net\n";
00193             ost<<" threadsCount: "<<threadCount<<std::endl;
00194             ost<<" lastNeuronId: "<<lastNeuronId<<std::endl;
00195             ost<<" lastWeightId: "<<lastWeightId<<std::endl;
00196             ost<<" neurons: ";
00197             ConstNeuronIter it = neurons.begin();
00198             for(; it != neurons.end(); ++it)
00199                 ost<<it->first<<" ";
00200             ost<<"\n weights: ";
00201             ConstWeightIter wit = weights.begin();
00202             for(; wit != weights.end(); ++wit)
00203                 ost<<wit->first<<" ";
00204             ost<<"\n inputNeurons: ";
00205             std::list<NeuronIter>::const_iterator it2 = inputNeurons.begin();
00206             for(; it2 != inputNeurons.end(); ++it2)
00207                 ost<<(*it2)->first<<" ";
00208             ost<<"\n\n neurons: ";
00209             for(it = neurons.begin(); it != neurons.end(); ++it)
00210                 it->second.printDebugInfo(ost);
00211             
00212             ost<<"\n\n Cache:\n";
00213             cache.printDebugInfo(ost);
00214         };

00218         friend class boost::serialization::access;
00219         template<class Archive>
00220             void save(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version) const
00221             {
00222                 boost::progress_display show_progress( 20 + neurons.size() + 20 );
00223 
00224                 ar & boost::serialization::base_object<Object>(*this);
00225 
00226                 //Saving basic data
00227                 ar & lastNeuronId;
00228                 ar & lastWeightId;
00229                 ar & threadCount;
00230                 ar & biasId;
00231                 ar & neurons;
00232                 show_progress += 10;
00233                 ar & weights;
00234                 show_progress += 10;
00235 
00236                 //Links already saved by 'ar & neurons', but field like 'to' - not
00237                 for(std::map<unsigned, Neuron>::const_iterator iter = neurons.begin(); iter != neurons.end(); ++iter)
00238                 {
00239                     unsigned size = iter->second.links.size();
00240                     ar & size;
00241                     BOOST_FOREACH( const Link& l, iter->second.links )
00242                     {
00243                         Link& link = const_cast<Link&>(l);
00244                         unsigned to = link.getToIter()->first;
00245                         unsigned w  = link.getWeightIter()->first;
00246                         unsigned dir= (unsigned)link.getDirection();
00247                         unsigned latency = (unsigned)link.getLatency();
00248                         ar & to;
00249                         ar & w;
00250                         ar & dir;
00251                         ar & latency;
00252                     }
00253 
00254                     show_progress += 1;
00255                 }
00256                 
00257                 //Saving input neurons
00258                 unsigned size;
00259                 size = inputNeurons.size();
00260                 ar & size;
00261                 BOOST_FOREACH( NeuronIter iter, inputNeurons )
00262                 {
00263                     unsigned id = iter->first;
00264                     ar & id;
00265                 }
00266                 show_progress += 10;
00267 
00268                 //Saving cache
00269                 unsigned layers = cache.data.size();
00270                 ar & layers;
00271                 for(unsigned l = 0; l < cache.data.size(); l++)
00272                 {
00273                     for(unsigned t = 0; t < threadCount; t++)
00274                     {
00275                         unsigned size = cache.data[l][t].size();
00276                         ar & size;
00277                         BOOST_FOREACH( NeuronIter iter, cache.data[l][t] )
00278                         {
00279                             unsigned id = iter->first;
00280                             ar & id;
00281                         }
00282                     }
00283                 }
00284                 show_progress += 10;
00285 
00286                 bool isHintAvailable;
00287                 //Learning hint
00288                 (learningHint != 0) ? (isHintAvailable = true) : (isHintAvailable = false);
00289                 ar & isHintAvailable;                    
00290                 if(isHintAvailable)
00291                 {
00292                     LearningHint::HintId lhintId = learningHint->getTypeId();
00293                     ar & lhintId;
00294                     ar & (*learningHint);
00295                 }
00296                 
00297             };

00299         template<class Archive>
00300             void load(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)
00301             {
00302                 ar & boost::serialization::base_object<Object>(*this);
00303 
00304                 //Restoring basic data
00305                 ar & lastNeuronId;
00306                 ar & lastWeightId;
00307                 ar & threadCount;
00308                 ar & biasId;
00309                 ar & neurons;
00310                 boost::progress_display show_progress(20 + neurons.size() + 20);
00311                 show_progress += 10;
00312                 ar & weights;
00313                 show_progress += 10;
00314                
00315                 //Loading links data, converting neuron ID's to iterators
00316                 for(NeuronIter iter = neurons.begin(); iter != neurons.end(); ++iter)
00317                 {
00318                     unsigned size;
00319                     ar & size;
00320                     for(unsigned i = 0; i < size; i++)
00321                     {
00322                         unsigned to, w, dir, latency;
00323                         ar & to;
00324                         ar & w;
00325                         ar & dir;
00326                         ar & latency;
00327                         NeuronIter to_it = neurons.find(to);
00328                         WeightIter  w_it = weights.find(w);
00329                         if(to_it == neurons.end() || w_it == weights.end())
00330                             throw Exception::FilesystemError()<<"Net::load(): can't load Net object. "
00331                                                                               "Archive possibly damaged\n";
00332                         iter->second.links.push_back(Link(to_it, (Link::Direction)dir, w_it, latency));
00333                     }
00334                     show_progress += 1;
00335                 }
00336 
00337                 //Loading list of input neurons
00338                 inputNeurons.clear(); //may be we loading saved net into existing net with neurons?
00339                 unsigned size;
00340                 ar & size; 
00341                 for(unsigned i = 0; i < size; i++)
00342                 {
00343                     unsigned id; ar & id;
00344                     NeuronIter iter = neurons.find(id);
00345                     inputNeurons.push_back(iter);
00346                     if(iter == neurons.end())
00347                         throw Exception::FilesystemError()<<"Net::load(): can't load Net object. "
00348                                                                 "Archive possibly damaged\n";
00349                 }
00350                 show_progress += 10;
00351 
00352                 //Loading cache
00353                 cache.flush();
00354                 unsigned layers;
00355                 ar & layers;
00356                 for(unsigned l = 0; l < layers; l++)
00357                 {
00358                     cache.data.push_back(NetCache::FrontType()); //add new layer to cache
00359                     for(unsigned t = 0; t < threadCount; t++)
00360                     {
00361                         cache.data[l].push_back(NetCache::ThreadTaskType()); //add new thread task info to current layer
00362                         unsigned size;
00363                         ar & size;
00364                         for(unsigned n = 0; n < size; n++)
00365                         {
00366                             unsigned id;
00367                             ar & id;
00368                             NeuronIter iter = neurons.find(id);
00369                             cache.data[l][t].push_back(iter);
00370                             if(iter == neurons.end())
00371                                 throw Exception::FilesystemError()<<"Net::load(): can't load Net object. "
00372                                                                         "Archive possibly damaged\n";
00373                         }
00374                     }
00375                 }
00376                 cache.fixed();
00377                 show_progress += 10;
00378 
00379                 bool isHintAvailable;
00380                 //Learning hint
00381                 ar & isHintAvailable;
00382                 if(isHintAvailable)
00383                 {
00384                     LearningHint::HintId lhintId;
00385                     ar & lhintId;
00386                     learningHint = LearningHint::getById(lhintId);
00387                     ar & learningHint;
00388                 }
00389             };
00390
